ideas.title: Universal Business Operating System (Solution Planner v2)
ideas.description: Transform the Solution Planner from a lightweight dashboard viewer into a comprehensive business management framework. Covers ALL business disciplines — project management, risk, R&D, production, materials, workflow, compliance, grants, environmental, resource management, waste (time + materials). Must be template-able so any business type can be spun up from it. The garden buildings dashboard, Whelpley Farm, Forge AI are all just instances of this universal framework. This IS the Forge AI product — the thing people clone and customise.
ideas.notes:
Andrew's directive 14 Feb 2026.

Key insight: Don't think small. Don't anchor to garden buildings. The Solution Planner IS the product.
